attributes.action: Help hard working people with savings
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Scrap tax credits as they only punish working people with savings, raise pensions above the poverty level ie £135 per week for all pensioners, and reintroduce 10p tax band.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
